mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_PROJECT_REPLY bpr, USERS u WHERE bpr.PBOARD_NO = #{pboard_no} AND bpr.USER_NO = u.USER_NO AND bpr.PREPLY_NO NOT IN ( SELECT PREPLY_NO FROM BOARD_PROJECT_REPLY bpr2 WHERE bpr2.PBOARD_NO = #{pboard_no} AND bpr2.PREPLY_LEVEL = 0 AND bpr2.PREPLY_DELETE_CHK = 1 AND bpr2.PREPLY_GROUP IN ( SELECT PREPLY_GROUP FROM BOARD_PROJECT_REPLY bpr3 WHERE bpr3.PBOARD_NO = #{pboard_no} GROUP BY bpr3.PREPLY_GROUP HAVING COUNT(bpr3.PREPLY_NO) = 1 ) ) AND bpr.PREPLY_GROUP NOT IN (SELECT bpr4.PREPLY_GROUP FROM (SELECT PREPLY_GROUP, COUNT(PREPLY_NO) cnt1 FROM BOARD_PROJECT_REPLY WHERE PBOARD_NO = #{pboard_no} AND PREPLY_DELETE_CHK = 1 GROUP BY PREPLY_GROUP HAVING COUNT(PREPLY_NO) > 1) bpr4, (SELECT PREPLY_GROUP, COUNT(PREPLY_NO) cnt2 FROM BOARD_PROJECT_REPLY WHERE PBOARD_NO = #{pboard_no} GROUP BY PREPLY_GROUP) bpr5 WHERE bpr4.PREPLY_GROUP = bpr5.PREPLY_GROUP AND bpr4.cnt1 = bpr5.cnt2) AND bpr.PREPLY_NO NOT IN (SELECT PREPLY_NO FROM BOARD_PROJECT_REPLY WHERE PBOARD_NO = #{pboard_no} AND PREPLY_LEVEL > 0 AND PREPLY_DELETE_CHK = 1) ORDER BY PREPLY_GROUP DESC, PREPLY_LEVEL ASC
SELECT * FROM BOARD_PROJECT_REPLY bpr, USERS u WHERE bpr.USER_NO = u.USER_NO AND PREPLY_NO = #{preply_no}
